refnamediv.refpurpose: GInterfaces for D-Bus objects exporting Telepathy properties and common D-Bus core interfaces

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Known Implementations
refsect1.para: TpSvcDBusProperties is implemented by TpDebugSender and TpBaseConnection.

refsect1.title: Signals
refsect1.synopsis: "properties-changed" : Run Last / Has Details "property-flags-changed" : Run Last / Has Details

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The D-Bus Properties interface associates named properties with any D-Bus object.
The D-Bus Introspectable interface provides introspection information.
The D-Bus Peer interface is exported by every D-Bus object.

The Telepathy Properties interface associates a number of named properties with a channel, connection or other D-Bus object. Signals are emitted when the properties or their flags (readable/writable) change.

refsect2.title: TpSvcDBusIntrospectable
refsect2.para: Dummy typedef representing any implementation of this interface.

refsect2.title: TpSvcDBusIntrospectableClass
refsect2.para: The class of TpSvcDBusIntrospectable.
In a full implementation of this interface (i.e. all methods implemented), the interface initialization function used in G_IMPLEMENT_INTERFACE() would typically look like this:

In a full implementation of this interface (i.e. all methods implemented), the interface initialization function used in G_IMPLEMENT_INTERFACE() would typically look like this:

refsect2.title: tp_svc_dbus_introspectable_implement_introspect ()
refsect2.para: Register an implementation for the Introspect method in the vtable of an implementation of this interface. To be called from the interface init function.

listitem.simpara: A class whose instances implement this interface
A callback used to implement the Introspect D-Bus method

refsect2.title: tp_svc_dbus_introspectable_introspect_impl ()
refsect2.para: The signature of an implementation of the D-Bus method Introspect on interface org.freedesktop.DBus.Introspectable.

listitem.simpara: Used to return values or throw an error

refsect2.title: tp_svc_dbus_introspectable_return_from_introspect ()
refsect2.para: Return successfully by calling dbus_g_method_return(). This inline function exists only to provide type-safety.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_emit_properties_changed ()
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the PropertiesChanged signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.

refsect2.title: tp_svc_properties_interface_emit_property_flags_changed ()
refsect2.para: Type-safe wrapper around g_signal_emit to emit the PropertyFlagsChanged signal on interface org.freedesktop.Telepathy.Properties.

refsect2.title: The "properties-changed" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (TpSvcPropertiesInterface *arg_Properties, gpointer user_data) : Run Last / Has Details
refsect2.para: The PropertiesChanged D-Bus signal is emitted whenever this GObject signal is.

listitem.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.

refsect2.title: The "property-flags-changed" signal
refsect2.programlisting: void user_function (TpSvcPropertiesInterface *arg_Properties, gpointer user_data) : Run Last / Has Details
refsect2.para: The PropertyFlagsChanged D-Bus signal is emitted whenever this GObject signal is.

listitem.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
